pr_title: DB-9124 Large concat expression cause long time hanging

timeline.message: DB-9124 Large concat expression cause long time hanging

timeline.bodyText: It seems this query used to work (slowly) before the fix, right? In that case we'd need to add a timeout for instance, to make sure the test fails if there's a regression. Or make the query bigger so that it crashes without the fix.
timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: Agreed. I set the test case failed after 1 second. Without the fix, it took more than 10 seconds.
replies.author: changli6
